column4: hi I have used fsdisk and dd to copy the partition table & data to a new disk... I then used dd to copy the first 512 bytes of /dev/sda to /dev/sdb ... why doesn't the new disk boot?  I only get a GRUB prompt!
make sure the new disk's partition(s) are checked as "bootable"
that property might not be handled by either of those tools in those operations
the same partition on both disks are marked bootable.. (i.e. the first)
